fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may, one per night, create a role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The role must be unique, and may not be similar to any other existing role.
- at least 2/3rds of @jdxtreme  @zerosage @vikuale2  @accentillia  @squidlies must agree that the role is good, or else you do not turn into it.
- Upon 2/3rds or more of @jdxtreme  @zerosage  @vikuale2  @accentillia  @squidlies agreeing that the role is good, you transform into it.
